name: EchoWars
description:
// If you can, its recommended to download the game and play it as that provides

//better visuals than the web version. Some Glow effects and colors aren't available 

//in the web version

You're a robot fighting off invisible wizards, using echolocation to detect their presence.

Wizards keep shooting fireballs at you whenever they face you, so try to keep moving so they have to keep rotating to face your robot. Getting close to them would also result in losing Health. The Robot will shoot at wherever the cursor is, and as fast as you can click (there's no limit on the rate of shooting). 

The waves get harder and harder as time goes on. And if you haven't played action games before it might be difficult for you since this game requires hand-eye coordination.

I wish thee best of luck.
